Subject: Re: The taunting ends. The death begins

OOC: Toucher Kinger.

::Amperion::
    He transforms and draws his four blades (two attached to the backs of his 
arms and two swords).  He sees the bot moving.  The one with the faint 
shimmer that had to be a shield of some sort.  He noticed the other one 
firing at him.  He jumps straight up spinning and flipping in the air.  He 
ends up behind and above the shielded one and reverses his grip on his swords 
so that they are pointed downward.  He rotates his wrist in a way no human 
could do.  He ends up with both blades pointed down and the backhand blades 
downward too.  (This all takes approximately one-second.)  He speeds downward 
screaming "DIE TYRANT!!!!!"
